user_text: They serve Dominican breakfast! The portion was massive, which was challenging because everything was delicious. The owners are also very, very sweet.Will come back for pernil..

Found this while working around the area, plenty of seating, Restaurant is located downstairs...food choice not too much when I went, but I tell you what...I went with the pernil, yellow rice, beans, potatoe salad, and it was the right meal to beast on, on this rainy day! Everything came out to 9$ which was awesome because of the huge portion of the meal
Great hidden gem in Jersey City. Highly recommend it if you're nearby!

It's a small family run restaurant, but there's no arguing with the quality of the food. The pernil (roast pork) is my favorite, but everything is tasty and authentic. The portions are generous and the prices are reasonable. It's by no means fancy - more cafeteria style. But if you're looking for tasty Spanish food, this place is well worth a try.
